item.description:
Does anyone have Veteran's day off? It's suppose to be 63 and sunny. I am going with another group but wanted to put this out. Hey guys, I finally signed on to a real estate agency, yeah!

I haven't biked since our last one in Oct. and I feel fat :(

Ride is about 10-11 miles one way.

DIRECTIONS:
Take your best route to I - 95 South towards Attleboro, take I-295 South exit 4 and then take exit 9 (the second one I believe) and turn around to 295 North, the visitor center is between exits 9 & 10 off 295N.

http://www.blackstoneriverbikeway.com/map.html

We won't be doing the Massachusetts section, just the RI section.

http://www.blackstoneriverbikeway.com/

http://www.nps.gov/blac/planyourvisit/blackstone-river-bikeway-the-rhode-island-section.htm
item.name: Blackstone on Veteran's Day
